Umm. How did TM3 Volois know of the mind erasing device??


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> TM3 Vulois could see it in the distance: The Predacon ship. And he 
> knew how he would get in. But he hopes they don't detect him. This 
> signal masker only has a few cycles left of energy. He finds the
air 
> vent, opens it up and starts crawling through, putting the vent
back 
> in place. Being a Predacon, he could normally just enter the base. 
> But Hell Beast would see his new body and would start asking 
> questions. Questions he didn't want to answer. Besides, he wouldn't 
> be a Predacon for much longer.
> 
> "Acording to my scanners, the machine is right here."
> 
> Vulois opens up the vent which leads into Scorponok's lab. On one
of 
> the table's he sees a box with a big button on it.
> 
> "Yes. With this box I can whipe DarkMouse's program and re-program 
> her to serve myself and Soundwave! I will make her a TM3 and she 
will 
> aide us in the ruling of Cybertron!"
> 
> Just then his internal computer talked to him.
> 
> "Signal Masker has gone offline."
> 
> Oh Crap! Now he's gotta get out of here. The Preds can see his 
> signature. He hopes he won't encounter any on the way out.
